This course will provide network engineers with the ideas of what technologies 
Microsoft Server 2012 has to offer in the world of High Availability and the steps to successfully plan, implement, and support High Availability solutions for their managed Windows environment. A few features weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll cover are NIC Teaming, DHCP Scope Failover, Network Load Balancing, and more. A strong working knowledge of general hardware, networking, and Windows core infrastructure services is recommended.
